thread.title: Police: 12-year-old girl missing after running away from school | Chicago Sun-Times
thread.title_full: Police: 12-year-old girl missing after running away from school | Chicago Sun-Times

title: Police: 12-year-old girl missing after running away from school | Chicago Sun-Times
text:
Police: 12-year-old girl missing after running away from school 
Ismerai Maisonet | Chicago Police Sun-Times Wire Sign-Up for our News & Politics Newsletter Sign-Up 
Police are searching for a 12-year-old girl who ran away from school after being dropped off Wednesday morning in the Northwest Side Humboldt Park neighborhood. 
Ismerai Maisonet ran away from school after being dropped off near Kimball and Hirsch, according to a missing person alert from Chicago Police. 
She is described as a 5-foot-2, 100-pound Hispanic girl with black hair, brown eyes and a medium complexion, police said. 
Anyone with information is asked to call the Area North Special Victims Unit at (312) 744-8266. Previously from Chicago News
